price: 41. Maalintaan qaraabannimo waxba laysugu tareyn laysuna gargaareyn.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي مَوۡلًى عَن مَّوۡلٗى شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yugh'nī mawlan ʿan mawlan shayan walā hum yunṣarūna
